questions.question: What is the predominant color of the packaging's background, visually prominent across the majority of its surface?
Considering the packaging's design, what is the most visually striking element, clearly presented in the center?
What is the shape of the central label, easily discernible against the backdrop?
What is the primary color of the central label, visually contrasting with the package's background?
What type of words are printed across the packaging's surface, creating a textured design?
What color are the words printed on the packaging, visually distinct from the background?
What is the overarching color palette of the secondary text on the packaging, aside from the primary green?
What is the implied texture of the product inside the packaging, given the packaging's design?
Considering the label, what is the apparent product type contained within?
What is the scent indicated on the label, as a descriptor of the product inside?
What is the apparent usage indicated by the labeling of the product within?
What is the general form or shape of the packaging, visually presented?
What is the apparent material of the outer packaging, visually inferred from its appearance?
What is the overall style of the text design, considering the arrangement of the words on the packaging?
What is the type of product indicated by the label's text, and imagery?
